pages.text: Data Shards are exceedingly useful, if somewhat complicated items used by a variety of machines and devices to read and store data. $(br2)Their most important use is collecting data from the world around you, this can be done shift-right clicking blocks, hitting entities, or if you want to collect your own data, clicking the air.

pages.title: Data Shard
pages.text: A data shard may be cleared of data by shift-right clicking the air.
